thread.title: Centara Grand at Central Plaza Ladprao Bangkok appoints Wim N.M. Fagel as General Manager
thread.title_full: Centara Grand at Central Plaza Ladprao Bangkok appoints Wim N.M. Fagel as General Manager

author: eTN Editor
title: Centara Grand at Central Plaza Ladprao Bangkok appoints Wim N.M. Fagel as General Manager
text:
Centara Grand at Central Plaza Ladprao Bangkok appoints Wim N.M. Fagel as General Manager Adv: Wim N.M. Fagel Adv: 
BANGKOK, Thailand â€“ Thirayuth Chirathivat, Chief Executive Officer of Centara Hotels & Resorts, has announced the appointment of Wim N.M. Fagel as General Manager for Centara Grand at Central Plaza Ladprao Bangkok. 
Centara is a member of the International Coalition of Tourism Partners (ICTP) . Source: Centara Hotels & Resorts
